data.name: Endless Space® 2 - Little Grin Man Update
data.detailed_description:
The free “Little Grin Man” update for Halloween features a character whom we nicknamed internally "the Little Green Man", turns up in many, many quest artworks and seems to have a spectator's seat for many events around the galaxy. Many among our community have speculated that this little guy was definitely part of an upcoming faction, surely, otherwise why would he be here, why would he be there, why would he be everywhere?

The Little Grin Man Update includes


  • Rhync aka The Photobomber, a new scary hero.

  • A new "Antihero with a Thousand Faces" quest featuring our little friend.

  • The Amblyr, a new minor civilization based on the Little Grin Man.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (64bits only) 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: i3 4th generation / i5 2nd generation / A6 series
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / AMD Radeon 5800 series / NVidia 550Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Resolution: 1280 x 720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (64bits only) 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: i3 5th generation (or newer) / i5 3rd generation (or newer) / FX4170 (or newer)

  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 8000 series or newer / NVidia GTX 660 or newer
